title: Pepper’s Red-Hot Pepper Sauce
source: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
categories: Cravings Hungry for More - Chrissy Teigen
ingredients: 2tablespoons toasted Thai red chile powder (see Tip, this page)
directions: In a small bowl, combine the chile powder and hot water. Stir in the fish sauce and toasted rice powder. Squeeze in the pulp of the tomatoes (discard the skins) and stir together. The sauce will keep in the fridge for a week or so.
